name: Frog Adventure (AhmetFix)
description:
This is my first unity game. 

Show some respect.

Frog adventure

Are you want a "Adventure" ?

If you want Adventure, I to direct frog adventure to you.

Why gameplay is short ?

I am a new game creator in unity. 

I am still a young learner. 

Please show some respect.

If you want gameplay continues, Subscribe my youtube channel.

I am waiting for your ideas and opinions about the game in the comments.

(Türk kankiler, oyun hakkındaki görüş ve fikirlerinizi bekliyorum ha.)
